name: Chicken Sausage & Hash Brown Breakfast Grilled Cheese
author: Jones Dairy Farm
summary: This sandwich makes so much sense, we're surprised it's not a classic. Oozing cheese, crispy hash browns and savory chicken sausage. What could be better?
ingredients: 4  Jones Dairy Farm All Natural Golden Brown® Chicken Sausage Patties
directions: Cook hash browns according to package directions and set aside
Brown sausage patties according to package directions
Heat frying pan to medium heat
Butter one side of each piece of bread
Place two bread slices, buttered side down, in skillet
Top each slice with two slices Havarti or Gouda, sausage, hash browns and two slices Cheddar cheese
Top with remaining slice of bread, buttered side up
Cook for 3-4 minutes or until lightly browned
Before flipping, press sandwich down with spatula
Flip and cook for an additional 3-4 minutes or until golden brown and cheese is melted
